meanings.definition: A particular philosophy of life or conception of the world.
meanings.sent1: Her worldview shaped her beliefs and actions.
meanings.sent2: His worldview was influenced by his upbringing.
meanings.sent3: Looking at the world through her unique worldview, she found beauty in unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: His worldview was like a pair of glasses, coloring everything he saw.
meanings.sent5: The artist's worldview was reflected in every stroke of her brush.

meanings.definition: The overall perspective from which one sees and interprets the world.
meanings.sent1: From his worldview, the situation seemed completely different.
meanings.sent2: Her worldview allowed her to empathize with others easily.
meanings.sent3: With a quirky worldview, he saw humor in the most mundane situations.
meanings.sent4: Her worldview was a lens through which she viewed all experiences.
meanings.sent5: His optimistic worldview brightened even the darkest days.

meanings.definition: A comprehensive conception or image of the universe and of humanity's relation to it.
meanings.sent1: His worldview encompassed a deep respect for nature.
meanings.sent2: She had a spiritual worldview that guided her decisions.
meanings.sent3: In his imaginative worldview, aliens were friendly creatures visiting Earth.
meanings.sent4: Her worldview was like a map guiding her through life's challenges.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's worldview expanded as he delved deeper into the mysteries of the universe.
